InstanceName.title: InstanceName
InstanceName.description: Instance name for the device. Required. This is used to match the definition with a connected device.

Inputs.title: Inputs
Inputs.description: List of inputs supported by the device. Optional.

Id.title: Id
Id.description: The input's unique identifier on the joystick. Required.

Label.title: Label
Label.description: Friendly label for the input. Required.

Type.title: Type
Type.description: The input's type. Supported values: Button, Axis.

Outputs.title: Outputs
Outputs.description: List of outputs supported by the device. Optional.

Id.title: Id
Id.description: The unique identifier for the output. Required.

Byte.title: Byte
Byte.description: Byte location of the output. Required.

Bit.title: Bit
Bit.description: Bit location within the byte of the output. Required.

ProductId.title: VendorId
ProductId.description: The device's USB VendorId. Required if Outputs are provided.

VendorId.title: ProductId
VendorId.description: The device's USB ProductId. Required if Outputs are provided.
